summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4446 for the improvement of the alley between Blocks 7 and 8, Front Street Cable Addition, being the alley between Queen Anne Avenue and 1st Avenue North, from Ray Street to Smith Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 52524, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
